item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

 

The January 2012 event was incredible, I had to limit attendance so that everyone who came could at least sing two songs.  So if you really want to attend, please sign up right away.

I am pleased to announce the February Boston Karaoke Meetup for 2012.  We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 6-9PM so please try to get there by 6PM to get the most out of this Meetup.

If you have a guest and would like that person to have a Name Tag just have him/her register on the site and RSVP directly.

I expect the February 2012 Karaoke Meetup to be very well attended.  To make sure you have  a spot, sign up early.

Regards,
-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back with the Karaoke machine or call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - February 2012
